refnamediv.refpurpose: Functions to query OpenGL support information

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: gdk_gl_query_extension ()
refsect2.para: Indicates whether the window system supports the OpenGL extension (GLX, WGL, etc.).

listitem.simpara: TRUE if OpenGL is supported, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gdk_gl_query_extension_for_display ()
refsect2.para: Indicates whether the window system supports the OpenGL extension (GLX, WGL, etc.).

listitem.simpara: the GdkDisplay where the query is sent to.
TRUE if OpenGL is supported, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gdk_gl_query_version ()
refsect2.para: Returns the version numbers of the OpenGL extension to the window system.
In the X Window System, it returns the GLX version.
In the Microsoft Windows, it returns the Windows version.

listitem.simpara: returns the major version number of the OpenGL extension.
returns the minor version number of the OpenGL extension.
FALSE if it fails, TRUE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gdk_gl_query_version_for_display ()
refsect2.para: Returns the version numbers of the OpenGL extension to the window system.
In the X Window System, it returns the GLX version.
In the Microsoft Windows, it returns the Windows version.

listitem.simpara: the GdkDisplay where the query is sent to.
returns the major version number of the OpenGL extension.
returns the minor version number of the OpenGL extension.
FALSE if it fails, TRUE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gdk_gl_query_gl_extension ()
refsect2.para: Determines whether a given OpenGL extension is supported.
There must be a valid current rendering context to call gdk_gl_query_gl_extension().

gdk_gl_query_gl_extension() returns information about OpenGL extensions only. This means that window system dependent extensions (for example, GLX extensions) are not reported by gdk_gl_query_gl_extension().

listitem.simpara: TRUE if the OpenGL extension is supported, FALSE if not supported.

refsect2.title: gdk_gl_get_proc_address ()
refsect2.para: Returns the address of the OpenGL, GLU, or GLX function.

listitem.simpara: the address of the function named by proc_name.
